item.title: Damm Group
item.dc:creator: Olinta Lopez
item.description:
Control and maintenance of fire protection installations

The post Damm Group appeared first on TicTAP.
item.content:encoded:
Success cases: Damm Group

Control and maintenance of extinguisher installations

In a company of the magnitude of DAMM, facilitating management in any process means maximizing productivity and efficiency. Compliance with regulations is necessary to ensure the safety of employees and factories, but the maintenance required with traditional systems (paper, excels, etc.) as many companies do, make this management and maintenance a cumbersome task, easy to create errors and ultimately costly for the company. Therefore, Damm Group has TicTAP for the management and maintenance of its fire prevention equipment and fire extinguishers.

Improved safety and efficiency with instantly updated fire extinguishers

With TicTAP, fire extinguishers and maintenance equipment become information containers themselves. The person responsible for maintenance only needs to bring the mobile to the TicTAP label of the extinguisher and enter the information of the new revision and maintenance performed. Simply, easy, functional and affordable.

By using the TicTAP platform, Grupo Damm has achieved:

  • Traceability of fire prevention assets
  • Asset Review (TPM)
  • Record and track incidents
  • Active review calendars
  • Internal staff communications
  • Automatically accessible review history

The post Damm Group appeared first on TicTAP.

item.title: Dagartech
item.dc:creator: Olinta Lopez
item.description:
Traceability of generator sets with nesting of assets

The post Dagartech appeared first on TicTAP.
item.content:encoded:
Success cases: Dagartech

Traceability of generator sets with nesting of assets

Dagartech is a leading generator company dedicated to providing reliable and efficient power solutions. With a large fleet of equipment and a solid track record in the rental and sale of generators, Dagartech faced the challenge of effectively managing the traceability of its assets, maintenance, technical documentation and incident reporting. In response to this need, Dagartech sought a comprehensive solution. With the implementation of TicTAP, Dagartech has managed to optimize its operation, improve efficiency in the management of its assets and provide exceptional service to its customers.

We provide efficiency, accuracy and rapid access to critical information

By incorporating TicTAP NFC tags into its assets, Dagartech has achieved complete traceability of generators thus facilitating their management and monitoring. In addition, TicTAP has provided them with a maintenance module that allows them to create work orders efficiently, ensuring proper maintenance of equipment. The platform has also been key to accessing technical documentation, such as manuals and specifications.

TicTAP Revolutionizes Dagartech Asset Management: More Than 2,500 Traced Assets

As a result of the implementation of TicTAP, Dagartech has managed to trace more than 2,500 families of generators and more than 7,000 rental units. In addition, they have obtained accurate CAPEX reports from offshore units, enabling them to make strategic decisions based on specific data. Overall, TicTAP has been a comprehensive solution that has boosted Dagartech’s efficiency, traceability and operational success in managing its generators.

The post Dagartech appeared first on TicTAP.

item.title: Delgado Instal·lacions
item.dc:creator: Olinta Lopez
item.description:
Integration and improved efficiency in facility maintenance.

The post Delgado Instal·lacions appeared first on TicTAP.
item.content:encoded:
Success cases: Delgado Instal·lacions

Unification and increase in efficiency in facility maintenance

Delgado Instal lacions is a benchmark company for its experience and specialization in the facilities sector in Andorra. One of its priorities is to be able to guarantee the customer an efficient operation of its facilities through its facility maintenance service.
To achieve its objective, Delgado Instal lacions investigates and invests in the digitization and automation of the tasks necessary for the matenimiento.

We promote efficiency and accessibility within the company

With the ability to create custom review modules without technical expertise, Delgado Instal lacions has established a fast and digitized review history, automatically accessible to all authorized users. TicTAP has been fundamental to its success, simplifying its processes, saving time and improving efficiency in its company.

By using the TicTAP platform, Delgado Instal lacions has achieved:

  • Facility Traceability
  • Asset Review (TPM)
  • Internal staff communications
  • Create custom review modules
  • Create custom review modules
  • Create revision history quickly and digitally

The post Delgado Instal·lacions appeared first on TicTAP.

item.title: TAG forklifts
item.dc:creator: Olinta Lopez
item.description:
Traceability and efficient management of forklift rental

The post TAG forklifts appeared first on TicTAP.
item.content:encoded:
Success stories: TAG Carretillas

Traceability and efficient management of forklifts

TAG Forklifts faced a crucial challenge: the lack of traceability of their assets. As a company dedicated to leasing and renting forklifts, it was essential to have an efficient system to manage the documentation, maintenance, incidents and history of each of its trucks. However, they lacked a solution that would allow them to accurately and quickly track information related to their assets. This led to difficulties in decision-making, waste of time searching for relevant data and inefficient management in general. In search of an effective solution, TAG Trucks turned to TicTAP, which has provided the necessary traceability and control to optimize its operation.

Provided efficiency, accuracy and quick access to critical information

The ability to keep historical records of trucks in digital format has been critical for TAG Trucks. They can now easily access all relevant information about each machine, including its maintenance history, repairs and upgrades, allowing them to make informed decisions about the management and replacement of their assets. In addition, TicTAP has been an invaluable tool for accessing user manuals, information on accessories and opportunities for improvement in rental.

Optimizing guarantees and preventive maintenance

The platform has also been key to managing the forklift warranty conditions, ensuring that the agreed terms are met and avoiding any inconvenience. In addition, TicTAP has simplified and improved the preventive maintenance process by providing custom checklists, ensuring every inspection is performed thoroughly and without omissions.

The post TAG forklifts appeared first on TicTAP.

item.title: Alstom
item.dc:creator: Olinta Lopez
item.description:
Traceability of rolling stock for trains, trams and cars

The post Alstom appeared first on TicTAP.
item.content:encoded:
Success cases: Alstom

Traceability of rolling stock for trains, trams and cars

Alstom, an outstanding leader in the railway industry worldwide, is dedicated to the design, manufacture and maintenance of equipment and transport solutions. With extensive experience and a focus on innovation, Alstom has faced the challenge of optimising the management and maintenance of its rolling stock, with the aim of improving operational efficiency and ensuring the safety of its services. Looking for a comprehensive solution, Alstom has turned to TicTAP to implement a solution that has completely transformed the way they manage and maintain their fleet of rail vehicles.

Full control of rolling stock and increased rotability: Alstom boosts your efficiency with TicTAP

With TicTAP, Alstom has achieved complete traceability of its rolling stock, ensuring accurate tracking of each unit. In addition, TicTAP has provided maintenance modules covering all necessary aspects, from installation to periodic reviews. The platform has also facilitated access to detailed technical documentation and ensured the compatibility of spare parts.

Improved problem management and historical records

By using incident forms, Alstom has improved problem management and maintained complete historical records of its assets. In addition, TicTAP has allowed to locate and rotate the assets efficiently, optimizing the operability of Alstom. In short, TicTAP has been a comprehensive solution that has boosted Alstom’s traceability, maintenance and operational efficiency in the rolling stock field.

The post Alstom appeared first on TicTAP.

item.title: Koni
item.dc:creator: Olinta Lopez
item.description:
Traceability of railway dampers and optimization of incident reporting

The post Koni appeared first on TicTAP.
item.content:encoded:
Success cases: Koni

Traceability of railway dampers and optimization of incident reporting

KONI is a recognized leader in the manufacture of high performance shock absorbers and suspension solutions for various sectors, from racing cars to everyday vehicles. With a strong reputation for quality and innovative technology, KONI has faced the challenge of efficiently managing the technical documentation, maintenance and traceability of its products. In search of a comprehensive solution, KONI has turned to TicTAP, transforming the way they manage their processes, improving efficiency, quality and customer satisfaction.

We provide efficient and accurate management of technical documentation

By incorporating TicTAP NFC tags into its assets, KONI has achieved efficient and accurate management of technical documentation for each specific serial number. In addition, TicTAP has provided a complete maintenance module covering installation, overhaul, inspection and other key aspects. It has also enabled the generation of shock absorber certificates, such as the 3.0 and welding inspection reports, ensuring quality and compliance with standards.

We promote efficiency in asset review processes

In short, the implementation of TicTAP has revolutionized the management of KONI, allowing them to have fast and accurate access to technical documentation, detailed monitoring of maintenance and review processes, as well as tools for incident reporting and graphical display of important data. This solution has boosted KONI’s efficiency, traceability and operational success in the shock absorber industry.

The post Koni appeared first on TicTAP.
